author: Stereogum
title: St. Vincent & Zach Galifianakis, Chvrches & Kristen Stewart Team Up For Planned Parenthood
text: In the wake of Trump's terrifying presidential victory, nonprofits like Planned Parenthood and the ACLU have been getting a lot of love. And they're about to get even more: former Stereogum staffer and current the Creative Independent editor-in-chief Brandon Stosuy has announced a vague collaboration between St. Vincent, Zach Galifianakis, and John Legend for Planned … More »
